changes.added: Malformed mail with multiple From headers should use first header (problem on any header defined as max number=1, for example From:. first header should be used))
changes.removed: Malformed mail with multiple From headers should use first header
Malformed mail with multiple From headers should use first header (problem on any header defined as max number=1, for example From:. first header should be used))
changes.added: Malformed mail with multiple From headers should use first header (problem on any header defined as max number=1, for example From:, To:. first header should be used)

changes.removed: Malformed mail with multiple From headers should use first header (problem on any header defined as max number=1, for example From:, To:. first header should be used)
changes.added: Malformed message with multiple headers of same type (but RFC 5322 max-number=1) should use first header in message header and message list consistently (first From:, To:, Date: etc. should be used)
Malformed message with multiple headers of same type (but RFC 5322 max-number=1) should use first header in message reader and message list consistently (first From:, To:, Date: etc. should be used)
changes.removed: Malformed message with multiple headers of same type (but RFC 5322 max-number=1) should use first header in message header and message list consistently (first From:, To:, Date: etc. should be used)

changes.added: Malformed message with multiple headers of same type (but RFC 5322 max-number=1) should use first header in message reader, message list, replies, filtering etc. consistently (only first From:, To:, Date: etc. should be used)
changes.removed: Malformed message with multiple headers of same type (but RFC 5322 max-number=1) should use first header in message reader and message list consistently (first From:, To:, Date: etc. should be used)

changes.added: For malformed message with multiple headers of same type (but RFC 5322 max-number=1), TB should only use the first header instance consistently (show/use only the first From:, To:, Date: etc. in message reader, message list, replies, filtering etc.)
changes.removed: Malformed message with multiple headers of same type (but RFC 5322 max-number=1) should use first header in message reader, message list, replies, filtering etc. consistently (only first From:, To:, Date: etc. should be used)
